short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type the words as fast as you can!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Word Zone is a fast typing game.

How to Play:

Score a point each time you type correctly. Score 45 or more points to win.

Click on the link in the popup window to launch the game.

Features:

- 9 levels
- Timer
- Score
- Highscore

To report bugs, please contact the developer. Thank you.

Version Updates:

Version 1.7 - The game has a new background colour.

Version 1.6 - The game has a new name and icon.

Version 1.5 - The game no longer automatically launches upon opening a new tab because users disliked this feature. Now the game only launches when you want it to launch. Users can now click on the link in the popup window to lunch the game in a new tab.

Version 1.4 - The game no longer repeats words.

Version 1.3 - The background colour is now easier on the eyes.

Version 1.2 - Minor adjustments.

Version 1.1 - Levels feature added.

Version 1.0 - Initial release.
